definition: cigarette or pipe tobacco/CL:根[gen1]/smoke/mist/vapour/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/tobacco plant/(of the eyes) to be irritated by smoke
as if degenerating into smoke (idiom); ignorant and unable to see where things are heading
moyamoya disease (rare brain disease first diagnosed in Japan)

sentences.english: MKM-PS27ER: Smoke Generator with external fluid pumping facility.
sentences.chinese: 煙霧發生器與外部流體抽水設施。

sentences.english: It soon turned into black smog as the smoke of the city poured into the air.
sentences.chinese: 隨着城市的煙排入天空，白霧很快變成了黑色煙霧。

sentences.english: He spat at the lonely cigarette, misty smoke wind.
sentences.chinese: 他吐着寂寞的菸捲，飄渺的煙霧隨風而散。

sentences.english: Added an option to turn off smoke and dust off the tank tracks.
sentences.chinese: 增加了可以關閉坦克行駛時的煙霧和揚塵的選項。

sentences.english: A young woman exhales cigarette smoke in Shanghai, China.
sentences.chinese: 在中國上海的一位年輕的婦女呼出香菸的煙霧。

sentences.english: The smoke grew thicker and I could see flames all around.
sentences.chinese: 煙霧越來越濃，四處火舌沖天。

sentences.english: Cigarette smoke and radiation also produce free radicals.
sentences.chinese: 香菸煙霧和輻射同樣會產生自由基。

sentences.english: Almost half of children regularly breathe air polluted by tobacco smoke.
sentences.chinese: 近半數兒童經常呼吸遭受菸草煙霧污染的空氣。

sentences.english: Sweet is for lily-livered puff balls made of much softer stuff than you.
sentences.chinese: 甜蜜就是用比你更柔軟的材料爲膽怯而做的煙霧彈。

sentences.english: Objective To study the diagnostic method and bleeding mechanism of the hemorrhagic moyamoya disease.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究出血性煙霧病的出血機制及檢查診斷方法。

sentences.english: The pipe lighted; smoke belched forth.
sentences.chinese: 菸斗點着了，煙霧冒了出來。

sentences.english: He always has a smoke after dinner, and makes the room smoky .
sentences.chinese: 他飯後總是吸支菸，弄得屋子滿是煙霧。

sentences.english: Back to the moody scores, I then wrote "Fogger, Snake, and Mud."
sentences.chinese: 回到穆迪分數，然後我寫了“煙霧機，蛇，和泥。”

sentences.english: Man dirties the air with gasses and smoke.
sentences.chinese: 人們通過氣體和煙霧來污染空氣。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the etiological factor and diagnostic method of Moyamoya disease.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究出血性煙霧病的出血機制及檢查診斷方法。

sentences.english: The towering cloud is circular. It is surrounded by hazy, gray-white smoke.
sentences.chinese: 堆起的雲團呈圓形，其被模糊的灰白色煙霧所籠罩。

definition: to pervade/to fill the air/diffuse/everywhere present/about to inundate (water)/permeated by (smoke)/filled with (dust)/to saturate (the air with fog, smoke etc)
cigarette or pipe tobacco/CL:根[gen1]/smoke/mist/vapour/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/tobacco plant/(of the eyes) to be irritated by smoke
lit. hiding the sky and covering the earth (idiom); fig. earth-shattering/omnipresent/of universal importance
